articles.title: How Queen Elizabeth will spend first Christmas since Prince Philip's death - Page Six
articles.description: This holiday season is particularly poignant for the Queen, as it’s her first since her husband of 73 years, Prince Philip, died at the age of 99 in April.
articles.content:
Queen Elizabeth II won’t be alone this Christmas.
